channel.title: BattleScape Reloaded - HIGHLY EDITED - EFFICIENT CODE - HIGH STABILITY
channel.description:
*
Features:
BattleScape base Rewritten combat(Perfect) - Mine Rewritten maxhit formula(Close to real RS) - Mine Hyperion methods converted for better stability Hyperion loading Almost every glitch fixed Firemaking added (Propper) Spirit shields with their propper effects Great pk server base Probobly the best base released at this moment aside from hyperion A lot of other features you'll have to check out on your own.
Media: [img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2qn36f5.gif[/img] [img]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/successfulthieve.png[/img] [img]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/getout.png[/img] [img]http://i898.photobucket.com/albums/ac190/TrebaurLul/levelingup.png[/img]
For the client, use BattleScape's client released by Palidino76
Credits:
Palidino76 WhiteFang Me

item.title: BattleScape Reloaded - HIGHLY EDITED - EFFICIENT CODE - HIGH STABILITY
item.dc:creator: @threadCount threadCount
item.description:
@threadCount wrote:

I don’t.

And you can check, that’s not the same as battlescapes bud, it’s REDONE to have propper max hits, instead of a 59 with a normal gs hit you won’t hit higher then a 52 now, etc.

If you want to see the combat, download the source and look at it, the code’s too large to paste the decent parts of it anyways. Compare it with any other sources, it’s not the same, whether you think I leeched it or not, it’s like BattleScape’s combat on steroids. As for the rewritten skills, basically what was done was just majorly cleaned up code, EX: 2D arrays used for better performance and shorter code, and as for Hyperion codes, I’ve simply just converted their connection handlers, and such.

[code] public ConnectionHandler(Type type) {
this.type = type;
}

@Override
public void exceptionCaught(IoSession session, Throwable throwable) throws Exception {
	logger.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error while handling request.", throwable);
}

@Override
public void messageReceived(IoSession session, Object in) throws Exception {
	((UpdateSession) session.getAttribute("session")).readLine((String) in);
}

@Override
public void sessionOpened(IoSession session) throws Exception {
	session.getFilterChain().addFirst("textFilter", new ProtocolCodecFilter(new TextLineCodecFactory()));
	session.setAttribute("session", new UpdateSession(type, session));
}

[/code]

Happy now? I’m no newfag, I’ve been programming RSPS for going on 5 years now, I just don’t like this site, I use a different one then this normally.

Read full topic

item.title: BattleScape Reloaded - HIGHLY EDITED - EFFICIENT CODE - HIGH STABILITY
item.dc:creator: @threadCount threadCount
item.description:
@threadCount wrote:

I never said it WAS runescapes max hit formula you retard.

A maxhit formula is simple shit:

[code] double maxHit = 0.100 + (playerBonus[10] * 2) * (strengthLvl * 0.00081);

or if you wanted to do it how runescape does it:

Max = 0.8 + C/10 + D/80 + C*D/640
Max = (C + 8) * (D + 64) / 640[/code]

Retard.

If you need to be proven wrong on anything else, just ask;). I may be new here, but I know I’m a better programmer then you can ever hope to become.

Read full topic
